Package org.jcvi.jillion.trim.lucy

This package contains trimmer implementations that follow the algorithms used by the TIGR program LUCY that was used to trim sanger reads.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LucyQualityTrimmerBuilder
    LucyLikeQualityTrimmerBuilder is a Builder that can create a QualityTrimmer that trims QualitySequences using the same algorithm as the TIGR program Lucy.
    LucyVectorSpliceTrimmerBuilder
    LucyVectorSpliceTrimmerBuilder is a class that builds a NucleotideTrimmer that finds the "vector free" Range of a NucleotideSequence using a simplified version of the algorithm that the TIGR program Lucy used.
    LucyVectorSpliceTrimmerBuilder.AdaptiveSearchArea
    Lucy uses an "adaptive search criteria" to find the vector splice sites that varies the minimum alignment criteria depending on where on the sanger sequence the splice site lies.
    LucyVectorSpliceTrimmerBuilder.AdaptiveSearchAreaBuilder
    Builder object that creates a new LucyVectorSpliceTrimmerBuilder.AdaptiveSearchArea object.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.trim.lucy Description

This package contains trimmer implementations that follow the algorithms used by the TIGR program LUCY that was used to trim sanger reads.
Author:
dkatzel
See Also:
Chou HH, Holmes MH. DNA sequence quality trimming and vector removal. Bioinformatics. 2001;17:1093-1104. doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/17.12.1093.
